mapper.sql: id, good_name, customer_id, sku, specification_model, available_stock, lock_stock, create_user, create_time, remarks
mapper.select:
select igor.id ,s.good_name goodName, s.customer_id customerId, s.sku, s.specification_model specificationModel, location.location_code locationCode, ((select number from goods_location_record g where g.ku_id = glr.ku_id and g.inGood_id = glr.inGood_id and g.type=1) - (select number from goods_location_record g1 where g1.ku_id = glr.ku_id and g1.inGood_id = glr.inGood_id and g1.type=2)) inventoryQuantityUnit, (select a.createTime from (select create_time createTime,ku_id kuId from goods_location_record g where type = 1 group by ku_id) a where not exists (select 1 from (select create_time createTime,ku_id kuId from goods_location_record g where type = 1 group by ku_id) b where b.kuId = a.kuId and b.createTime >= a.createTime )) updateTime from location left join warehouse_area_shelves_location wasl on location.location_id = wasl.id left join goods_location_record glr on wasl.id = glr.ku_id and glr.type = 1 left join in_goods_operation_record igor on glr.inGood_id = igor.id left join stock s on igor.sku = s.sku where status = 0
and location.location_id like concat('%',#{form.kuId},'%')
and s.sku like concat('%',#{form.sku},'%')
and s.`customer_id` in
#{customerId}
